overview: Bartal Vindzberg has 20 years of experience in leading engineering organizations and building world-class, enterprise-grade products. Bartal is responsible for the company’s technological vision. Prior, Bartal served as Director, Product Line Development at Symantec, overseeing and building various R&D units, where he was responsible for the definition, design and development of innovative Application Performance Management solutions. Bartal held several senior management positions at Veritas, Precise Software Solutions, and the Israeli Defense Forces. Bartal holds a BA in Computer Science from the Open University, Tel Aviv, and an MBA from the Kellogg School of Management, Northwestern University.
